entry.title: Telepathe And ExtraSlice Destroyer Revisited
entry.content: The other day we came across this nice article on Twenty Jazz Funk Greats about Telepathe, a band that is very dear to us. We wanted to post a reminder that the Destroyer version of our ExtraSlice beat-chopping app, filled with Telepathe’s samples, is still available for free in the iTunes app store.
